contextId.information: Possible locations are 1) a place in ancient Edom east of the Jordan River in modern western Jordan or 2) a place east of the Euphrates River in modern Iran. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

This was a region located in modern day Yemen. Here it represents a group of raiders or bandits from Sheba. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
These are the names of places. The people of these places used caravans to trade things with people from other lands. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
Translate this man's name as in [[:en:bible:notes:job:02:11|2:11]]. AT: "Zophar from the region of Naamah" (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
This is the name of a man. People from Teman are known as Temanites. Translate as in [[:en:bible:notes:job:02:11|2:11]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
Translate this man's name as in [[:en:bible:notes:job:02:11|2:11]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
This is the name of a people-group. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
Translate this man's name the same as in [[:en:bible:notes:job:32:01|32:2]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
